Variables.Name: Source__Workspace__SdkToken
Variables.Description: The SDK token with permission to read from the source topic

Variables.Name: Source__Workspace__Topic
Variables.Description: The name or id of the source topic

Variables.Name: Output__Topic
Variables.Description: The topic to write the data to

Variables.Name: Source__UseConsumerGroup
Variables.Description: Whether consumer group should be used

Variables.Name: Source__ConsumerGroup
Variables.Description: The consumer group to use. Defaults to Quix__Deployment__Id

Variables.Name: Source__Offset
Variables.Description: The offset to use. Valid values: latest, earliest
